title: SECLI CH/GVA - CREATE ACTIVE CLIENTS UBP-> SG PBS TIERS/PERSONS MAPPING FOR DCTM

task_list.instruction_title:
SECLI creates UBP->SG PBS Tiers/Person mapping for Documentum on EV1
CREATE MAPPING TABLE ON DOCUMENTUM SWITZERLAND
-    dbsecli..V_PREVIOUS_NUMBER (mapping between CustomerID and Tiers number)
-    dbsecli..V_PREVIOUS_NUMBER_PERSON_ALL (mapping between CustomerID and Person number)
